name: Quadratic puzzle 2
description: Introduction to the gameThe main goal of the game is to splice the disrupted animation fragments into a complete animation diagram. When all of them are spliced, you can visit this picture at will. You can also view it from different angles through the mouse pulley and the "a, s, D, W" key!game featuresThe biggest feature in the game is that the anime pictures are all beautiful girls of different styles, including white hair, black silk, royal sister, sweet baby...etc. You will always find the type you like and suit the preferences of the majority of people. And each level has a timer, and the sooner you complete the level, you can see these complete beautiful girls. If you're a strength fighter, you can also adjust the difficulty of the game when entering a level. The most difficult mode in the game requires homing 48 fragments, come and challenge!
